title: Why cant you play special game modes on the new client?
body: i can join in on the legacy client, but not the updated client.

replies.body:
Rotating Game Modes haven't made it to the Beta Client just yet. New features are being developed all the time, so I'm confident that this feature will be added later down the road.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Awesome, thanks! Will the new features be added before the season start, or more into the new year?

You know, I'm not really sure. Unfortunately, I don't work on the New Client Team, so I don't have any of that information. I'm confident those teams will get these new features out just as soon as they can, though. ^.^
